long_description: Stay shielded from the sun during outdoor adventures with the REI women's Paddler Hat. A wide brim and lightweight fabric provide plenty of coverage without sacrificing comfort. Lightweight nylon fabric features built-in UPF 50+ sun protection to shield skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Internal polyester headband keeps sweat out of your eyes; adjustable chin strap keeps the REI women's Paddler Hat securely in place.
short_description: Stay shielded from the sun during outdoor adventures with the REI women's Paddler Hat. A wide brim and lightweight fabric provide plenty of coverage without sacrificing comfort.
